metadata.description:
AI death metal band, Dadabots, is the project of artists and mad scientists, CJ Carr and Zack Zukowski. In “RUG THE ROBOTS,” Dadabots finds yet another way to push the furthest edges of creativity and technology by combining what they call “human learning,” with AI-generated choral harmonies, MIDI, and drum break samples. 

Inspired by cornerstone articles of Ethereum lore, “Ethereum is a Dark Forest” and “Sandwich Attacks vs Salmonella,” "RUG THE BOTS” tells the story of taking revenge on malicious bots acting as ecosystem predators. The song is both haunting and manic, featuring a choral section sung by CJ, and accompanied by an AI-generated choir. Pioneering on the fringe of music’s extremes, Dadabots strikes again. 

Revenge, it turns out, is sweet.

----

This is the ninth track from HIGH FREQUENCY Volume 1—a compilation album curated by NOISE.

Read interviews with each artist at noisedao.mirror.xyz.

lyrics.text:
My Lord, O my strength!
My mercy of mercies
Group me not with these evils, 
These unrighteous ones;
And in these darkest of hours
When raging bulls afflict me
And dogs nip at my feet
And all of my enemies look to cast me into Hades
I lift my head up at night, weeping
Crying for you my God
Hear my prayers

My Lord, O my strength!
I bless You for the faith You’ve had in me
My God, My King,
With Your grace,
First You give me weakness
And then lead me to prosperity
My faith, MY faith in You is never broken;
And he who knows not his ungodly ways shall be stricken down in Your wrath.
King of kings
Lord of lords
The Sword of swords
Cast from me my enemies into the pits of fire

Rug the bots
Rug the bots
Rug the bots
Rug the bots
Rug the bots
Rug the bots

metadata.name: Dadabots - RUG THE BOTS #1
metadata.title: Dadabots - RUG THE BOTS
